metadata.description: REQUIRED. Environment, including geographic location, for Power Automate - Ex for commercial: https://flow.microsoft.com/manage/environments/

Determines if you want to only update objects that have changed, or all objects. Defaults to No. Switching to Yes will cause the flows to inventory every single app/flow/etc in the tenant and make the flows long running

parameters.$filter: createdby/fullname ne 'SYSTEM' and publisherid/uniquename ne 'Microsoft'   and publisherid/uniquename ne 'MicrosoftCorporation' and publisherid/uniquename ne 'adxstudio' and publisherid/uniquename ne 'microsoftdynamicslabs'  and publisherid/uniquename ne 'microsoftdynamicscrmsdksamples'  and publisherid/uniquename ne 'MicrosoftDynamicsAILabs'  and publisherid/uniquename ne 'microsoftdynamics365'  and publisherid/uniquename ne 'microsoftdynamics'  and publisherid/uniquename ne 'microsoftfirstparty' and publisherid/uniquename ne 'dynamics365customerengagement'

List_Solutions.description: Do not collect or inventory solutions created by System

parameters.item/admin_flowinstanceurl: @concat(parameters('Power Automate Environment Variable (admin_PowerAutomateEnvironmentVariable)'), workflow()?['tags']['environmentName'], '/flows/', workflow()?['name'], '/runs/', workflow()?['run']['name'])

parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch>
  <entity name="admin_ppsolution_flow_table">
    <link-entity name="admin_flow" from="admin_flowid" to="admin_flowid" link-type="inner">
      <attribute name="admin_workflowentityid" />
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch>
  <entity name="admin_ppsolution_apps_table">
    <link-entity name="admin_app" from="admin_appid" to="admin_appid" link-type="inner">
      <attribute name="admin_appidstring" />
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>

parameters.$filter: (componenttype eq 300 or componenttype eq 80) and _solutionid_value eq @{items('Apply_to_each_Soln')?['admin_solutionenvtguid']}

List_Solutions_Apps.description: Do not collect or inventory solutions created by System

List_Solutions_Workflows.description: Do not collect or inventory solutions created by System
